code: import*as __vanilla_filescope__ from'@vanilla-extract/css/fileScope';__vanilla_filescope__.setFileScope("src/components/NavBar/style.css.ts","@uniswap/interface");import{style}from'@vanilla-extract/css';import{subhead}from'../../nft/css/common.css';import{sprinkles,vars}from'../../nft/css/sprinkles.css';export var logoContainer=style([sprinkles({display:'flex',marginRight:{sm:'12',xxl:'20'},cursor:'pointer'})],"logoContainer");export var logo=style([sprinkles({display:'block',color:'textPrimary'})],"logo");export var baseSideContainer=style([sprinkles({display:'flex',width:'full',flex:'1',flexShrink:'2'})],"baseSideContainer");export var leftSideContainer=style([baseSideContainer,sprinkles({alignItems:'center',justifyContent:'flex-start'})],"leftSideContainer");export var searchContainer=style([sprinkles({flex:'1',flexShrink:'1',justifyContent:{lg:'flex-end',xl:'center'},display:{sm:'none',xl:'flex'},alignSelf:'center',height:'48',alignItems:'flex-start'})],"searchContainer");export var rightSideContainer=style([baseSideContainer,sprinkles({alignItems:'center',justifyContent:'flex-end'})],"rightSideContainer");var baseMenuItem=style([subhead,sprinkles({paddingY:'8',paddingX:'16',marginY:'4',borderRadius:'12',transition:'250',height:'min',width:'full',textAlign:'center'}),{lineHeight:'24px',textDecoration:'none',':hover':{background:vars.color.lightGrayOverlay}}],"baseMenuItem");export var menuItem=style([baseMenuItem,sprinkles({color:'textSecondary'})],"menuItem");export var activeMenuItem=style([baseMenuItem,sprinkles({color:'textPrimary',background:'backgroundFloating'})],"activeMenuItem");__vanilla_filescope__.endFileScope();
